itemStyle: Graphic styles, including color, transparency, strokes, and etc.
itemStyle.color:
The color of the graphic. 

// pure white
[1, 1, 1, 1]

When using an array representation, each channel can set a value greater than 1 to represent the color value of HDR.
emphasis: Mouse hover Highlights the style of graphics and labels.
emphasis.itemStyle.color:
The color of the graphic. 

// pure white
[1, 1, 1, 1]

When using an array representation, each channel can set a value greater than 1 to represent the color value of HDR.
data:
A list of data for the polygon.

data: [{
    // A square
    coords: [[0, 0], [100, 0], [100, 100], [0, 100]],
    // Height
    height: 3
}, {
    // A triangle
    coords: [[50, 0], [100, 100], [0, 100]],
    // Height
    height: 5
}]
data.coords: A list of coordinates of the polygon. If multiPolygon is set to true, it is an array containing multiple polygons.
progressiveThreshold: Enable progressive rendering thresholds, progressive rendering can be loading the screen without blocking.
progressive: Progressively render the amount of data per render.
